linkedwiki-desc: See the linked data in a wiki
linkedwiki-error-server: Sorry, the SPARQL server sent an error. (see details with parameter log=2)
linkedwiki-error-endpoint-init: Sorry, there is an error with your endpoint (see details with parameter <kbd>log=2</kbd>).
linkedwiki-error-endpoint-empty: Where is the endpoint or the configuration?
linkedwiki-specialsparqlquery_mainpage:
This page will be used to test, optimize and share your queries if you wish.

Post your questions to: [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension_talk:LinkedWiki Talk:LinkedWiki]
linkedwiki-specialsparqlquery_usethisque: Howto use this query in this wiki

Copy and paste this line in a page of this wiki.

See more: [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Extension:LinkedWiki Extension:LinkedWiki]
linkedwiki-specialsparqlquery_option1par: (wihtout cache and only for public data)
linkedwiki-specialsparqlquery_option2tab: Table only (with cache and for public data or private data)
action-data-edit: edit data pages (in the namespaces Data and UserData), transfer these data with [[Special:RDFSave]] and check RDF graphs
right-data-edit: Edit data pages (in the namespaces Data and UserData), transfer these data with [[Special:RDFSave]] and check RDF graphs with [[Special:RDFUnit]]. [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Extension:LinkedWiki/Import_in_wiki_to_write,_check,_transfer_and_validate_RDF Documentations]
